##Loading Packages
```{r}
library(lehdr)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
dc_od <- grab_lodes(state = "dc", year = 2019, lodes_type = "od", job_type = "JT01", 
           segment = "S000", state_part = "main", agg_geo = "tract")
```
``` {r}
dc_wac <- grab_lodes(state = "dc", year = 2019, lodes_type = "wac", job_type = "JT01", 
           segment = "S000", state_part = "main", agg_geo = "tract")
```
